channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Marks 100 Days Before the Olympics
item.description: With just 100 days left until the Paris Summer Olympics, Taiwan is set to send a far smaller national team to this yearâ€™s games.

item.title: Tainan Temple Tradition Affected by Taiwan's Falling Birthrate
item.description: A centuries-old religious ceremony involving a parade of children has been negatively affected by Taiwan's dropping birthrate -- and its timing close to midterm exams.

item.title: TAIEX Sees Strong Rebound After Drop From Record Highs
item.description: Taiwan's stock market made a strong rebound on Wednesday after falling sharply from historic highs the day before. Geopolitics and a delay in interest rate cuts by the Fed have imp

item.title: President-Elect Lai Ching-te Visits Taichung Base, Praises Air Force Personnel
item.description: President-elect Lai Ching-te has visited an air base in Taichung where he praised the personnel for their defense of the country's airspace.
